attributes.action: To make a referendum result final no matter what the turnout !
attributes.additional_details: They also want a 65% result from a 75% turnout. The only way to ensure this high proportion you would need to make it a legal duty vote!
attributes.background: There is an apparent move to overturn the just held eu referendum by stating that the result should be re run because less than 75%  turnout.  This figure seems to have been plucked out of the air ?? Why not 70% ? Oh thats right , 72% turned out.
